title.narrative: Joint Voice against Trafficking and Unsafe Migration project

description.narrative: The GAA project is focusing on CT and economic exclusion of girls and young women in  Amhara Ethiopia. Targeting the following actors; government, community, CSOs and private sectors. The project intends to achieve outcomes across three levels of changes; Agenda setting, Policy change and practice change.
Expenditure 2020

title.narrative: By the end of project period, September 2020, representatives of different government offices acquire basic knowledge on CT and EE issues of girls and young women

description.narrative: By the end of project period, September 2020, representatives of different government offices acquire basic knowledge on CT and EE issues of girls and young women

title.narrative: Number of government officials sensitised

description.narrative: Number of government officials sensitised

comment.narrative: In this reporting period, we utilized over budget. This is because some of quarter one and two activities budget were postponed and re-planned to quarter three due to COVID 19 .;
The budget from this output has been moved to other outputs due to revision following COVID-19 and state of emergency.;

The existing budget allowed to increase the number of participants. Besides, the consultative meetings will also continue to the rest of the coming quarters of 2020. So the remaining budget will be used accordingly;
The expense is only program staff salary.;

comment.narrative: Due to the current existence of COVID-19 the world wide pandemic, and following with the enactment of the Ethiopian government state of emergency prevented to conduct the activity as per the plan.;
In this reporting period, we utilized over budget. This is because some of quarter one and two activities budget were postponed and re-planned to quarter three due to COVID 19 .;
Planned to be conducted in the second and third quarters 2020;

The activity was planned in quarter 3 but moved to this quarter due to COVID-19 pandemic. The adjustment of budget from leftover budget lines helped to increased performance during this reporting period.;

title.narrative: Number of public awareness campaigns conducted at community level

comment.narrative: Due to the current existence of COVID-19 the world wide pandemic, and following with the enactment of the Ethiopian government state of emergency prevented to conduct the activity as per the plan.;

Since the project implementation districts are eight, under this output, we have supported 8 Harmful Traditional Practice Committees and have conducted 9 campaigns (at eight districts and zone level). Besides, a dialogue conducted for four clubs;
The activity was planned in quarter 3 but moved to this quarter due to COVID-19 pandemic. The adjustment of remaining budget increased the performance of budget during this reporting period.;

title.narrative: Number of targeted CSOs trained in gender policy and practices

description.narrative: Number of targeted CSOs trained in gender policy and practices

comment.narrative: Due to COVID-19 pandemic, this output has been highly affected and postponed to project extension month (October 2020).;
Since the activities under this output are planned to continue in the coming quarters, those CSOs which are organized as members of the Network will involve in the next quarters with commitment;
The expense is only program staff salary.;

Training was provided on gender policy and practices for 8 CSOs. This training was planed in quarter 3 but moved to this quarter as a result of COVID-19. The increase in budget utilization is due to adjustment of the remaining budget so as to reach more targets.;

In this reporting period, we utilized over budget. This is because some of quarter one and two activities budget were postponed and re-planned to quarter three due to COVID 19 .;

This activity was planned in quarter 3 but moved to quarter 4 due to COVID-19 pandemic. The adjustment of budget from other budget lines resulted in increased budget performance during this reporting quarter.;

comment.narrative: Due to the current existence of COVID-19 the world wide pandemic, and following with the enactment of the Ethiopian government state of emergency prevented to conduct the activity as per the plan.;

The CSOs network meeting organised and attended by 14 CSOs drawn from the GAA project districts. It was planned in quarter 3 but moved to this quarter due to COVID-19 pandemic. More budget is used to ensure full utilisation of output budget;
This activity will continue to the next quarter. So the remaining will be addressed accordingly;

The expense is only program staff salary. One activity under this output is moved to Q3 due to COVID-19.;
The world pandemic, COVID-19 affected the output. Besides, due to the absence of some private sector representatives in the training, we couldn't finish the total budget.;

comment.narrative: In this reporting period, we utilized over budget. This is because some of quarter one and two activities budget were postponed and re-planned to quarter three due to COVID 19 .;
The budget from this out put is moved to other outputs following state of emergency after COVID-19 pandemic;
